history.proof: intros m k z Hinv Hexd Hnosucc. hauto use: nosucc_top, top_bottom_bis.

ctx: intros m k z Hinv Hexd Hnosucc.
exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap k : dim z : dart Hinv : inv_hmap m Hexd : exd m z Hnosucc : ~ succ m k z Unable to unify "bottom m k z" with "bottom m k (bottom m k z)".

ctx: intros m k z Hinv Hexd Hnosucc.
intros m k z Hinv Hexd Hnosucc.
exceptions.exn: Cannot find a relation to rewrite.

ctx: intros m k z Hinv Hexd Hnosucc.
exceptions.exn: In environment H0 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> (succ m k z -> False) -> top m k z = z m : fmap k : dim z : dart H' : cA_1 m k z = z Hexd : exd m z Hnosucc : succ m k z -> False H : pred m k z Unable to unify "exd m z" with "succ m k z".

ctx: intros m k z Hinv Hexd Hnosucc.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros m k z Hinv Hexd Hnosucc. rewrite <- (nopred_bottom m k z). - apply nosucc_top; auto. - apply Hinv. - apply Hexd. - intro. apply Hnosucc. apply fixpt_cA_cA_1 with (m:=m) (k:=k) (z:=z) in Hinv. destruct Hinv as [_ H]. now rewrite H. + apply Hexd. + auto.
